field.name: measurerSet
field.comment: Measurers used to measure from begin to end of the kernel

field.name: cpu
field.comment: CPU the kernel should be started on. -1 means no pinning

field.name: warmCaches
field.comment: if true, warm caches, if false, clear caches before running the kernel

list.name: waitFor
list.comment: ids of the workloads which must be started or killed before this one is started

list.name: killOnExit
list.comment: ids of the workloads to be killed when this workload exits
